# PizzaWebAPI
Back-end API for a pizza delivery web app

# Setting environment variables and user secrets:

dotnet user-secrets init

dotnet user-secrets set "ConnectionStrings:PostgreSQLConnection" "Server=127.0.0.1;Port=5432;Database=PizzaDB;User Id=postgres;Password=root"

setx ASPNETCORE_AppSettings__TokenKey "" /M
